google ad words tips

http://www.makemoney24.biz/top-tips-for-adwords-campaigns/

Keywords are the terms (words or phrases) search trigger your ad, so crucial to the success of your AdWords advertising. This article will explain how to choose the most effective and to evaluate its performance. In addition we indicate how this affects the amount you pay.

Top tips for creating effective keywords.

An effective keyword meets the following requirements:

It consists of two or three words.
Is specific (the keywords too broad or general will not reach users as effectively as they are correctly oriented).
Is directly related to the ad text.
Is directly connected to the web page that directs the ad (via the URL).
